EmailTemplate.name: SOP Acknowledgment Email
EmailTemplate.subject: SecurePay Online Payments application submitted – {!Application__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Application__c.ContactFirstName__c},
Thank you for choosing SecurePay, a business of Australia Post, as your online payments partner.
We’ve received your application for a SecurePay Online Payments account and your application number is {!Application__c.Name}. You can quote this number if you have any questions about your application status.
SecurePay Online Payments details and pricing You’ve applied for a SecurePay Online Payments account, which will allow you to accept secure online payments. This includes an internet merchant account to process the payments and a payment gateway to securely link your e-commerce website to your internet merchant account.
A SecurePay Online Payments account has: • a 2.4 per cent fee on domestic Visa and MasterCard transactions, deducted when a payment is processed • no additional transaction fees • no set-up fees, no monthly or annual fees, and no long-term contracts.
Next steps Please email a copy of your business bank account statement to {!$Setup.APMSSetting__c.SopEmailTemplateEmail__c}. This can be in the form of PDF or image. Please ensure your application number is included in the subject line.
We’ll be in touch within three business days to let you know the status of your application.
In the meantime, if you need more details about SecurePay Online Payments or you’d like to check on your application, you can call {!$Setup.APMSSetting__c.AusPostSupportPhone__c} (option 1) or email: {!$Setup.APMSSetting__c.SopEmailTemplateEmail__c}
If you need any assistance, please let us know – we’re here to help.
Regards,
The SecurePay Online Payments Team SecurePay Pty Ltd – a business of Australia Post
